title: Graham Potter wants Ben Chilwell at West Ham United
description: Newly-appointed West Ham United manager Graham Potter is keen on signing Ben Chilwell from Chelsea in the January transfer window, according to Football Transfers. Potter worked with Chilwell when he was in charge of Chelsea, and the former Brighton and Hove Albion wants to bring the left-back to London Stadium in the middle of the […] The post Graham Potter wants Ben Chilwell at West Ham United appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Jamie Jones

title: Barcelona in contact over Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford
description: Barcelona are interested in signing Marcus Rashford from Manchester United in the January transfer window, according to GiveMeSport. The report has claimed that the La Liga club have made an initial contact over a move for Rashford. Rashford has failed to impress United manager Ruben Amorim and has been made available for a transfer by […] The post Barcelona in contact over Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Jamie Jones
